CustomField.description: Dependiendo del Record Type, se muestra el link al registro correspondiente
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.DeveloperName , "Policy" , HYPERLINK("/" & PolicyId__c, PolicyId__r.Name ), "Offer" , HYPERLINK("/" & OpportunityId__c , OpportunityId__r.Name ), "Claim" , HYPERLINK("/" & ClaimId__c , ClaimId__r.Name ), "Household" , HYPERLINK("/" & SecondaryAccountId__c , SecondaryAccountId__r.Name ), "")
CustomField.label: Identifier
